channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Walgreens shares soar more than 20% on big earnings beat, as drugstore chain cuts costs
item.description: Walgreens maintained its fiscal 2025 adjusted earnings guidance, but did not include a sales outlook in its release.

item.title: Here is our third-quarter earnings report card for 33 stocks in the portfolio
item.description: We ranked the quarterly reports of our holdings in the Club as great, good, not-so-bad and ugly.

item.title: Constellation Energy Agrees to Buy Calpine for $16.4 Billion
item.description: The merger combines two of the country’s largest power generators as demand for electricity surges.

item.title: How You Can See Through Wall Street's Ritual of Wrong
item.description: Analysts and market strategists love to predict what markets will do in the year ahead. Don’t let this misguided ritual blind you to what assets are r...

item.title: Trump's Potential Top Banking Regulators Tease Lighter Regulatory Touch
item.description: FDIC Vice Chairman Travis Hill will call for no change in capital requirements for the largest banks in his Friday speech.

item.title: Lucid reports record quarterly vehicle deliveries, meets production target
item.description: Lucid Group on Monday reported record quarterly vehicle deliveries for the fourth quarter and confirmed production of more than 9,000 vehicles in 2024...

item.title: Delta outlook tops estimates as CEO expects 2025 to be airline's 'best financial year in our history'
item.description: Delta's CEO said strong travel demand is driving revenue higher.

item.title: Dow Falls, Bond Yields Jump After Strong Payrolls Data
item.description: Stocks opened lower as investors assessed a blockbuster jobs report that makes future interest-rate cuts seem less likely.

item.title: Gold Rises After Strong U.S. Jobs Data
item.description: Gold prices gained further amid uncertainties over the impact of future U.S. policy on the economy and inflation, even after the latest jobs report su...

item.title: World's biggest chipmaker TSMC posts record 2024 revenue as AI boost continues
item.description: TSMC manufacturers semiconductors for some of the world's biggest companies from Apple to Nvidia.
